name: Resounding Chaos
description:
As part of a magical ritual you have accidentally created a being of sound and light who will soon overwhelm all that is holding it back. All you can do is try desperately to tune the motes of magic within the spell away from it, giving you time for someone... anyone to come help you.

They're coming... right?

Made in collaboration with https://mxbombardier.itch.io.
